_sText:
Little introduction
==============

-  **This is my version of the classic map surf_MegaWave from CS 1.6, i've made this map from ZERO, used some of the classic CS 1.6 texture and made it as cool as possible. FEAR THE MEGAWAVE!.**


 

 

 

 

Map specifications
==================

- Supports 64 players
- Optimized map *High FPS*
- Textures are comfortable to the eye (They fit with the structures)
- Fun to play
- "Almost final" version

**My nick in-game:** Lord Cheaterfield


**My steam ID:** STEAM_0:0:16113354


CS:GO version of my map here http://csgo.gamebanana.com/maps/176726
